Question: After the show, more than 1,000 teenagers tried to gang into this person's room at the auditorium. ..
Hints: On December 4, this person dropped into Sun Records where Carl Perkins and Jerry Lee Lewis were recording and jammed with them.
The Jordanaires sang harmony, as they had on The Steve Allen Show; they would work with this person through the 1960s.
In February 1961, this person performed two shows for a benefit event in Memphis, on behalf of 24 local charities.
